title: Gangplank Re-work, unhappy sailor.
body:
I am partially just venting, but also hoping anyone agrees with me on this, 

I have thought for a while on this, and overall I like the GP rework. 
his skill update, he looks more like a captain in general..... but.

where is his HAIR? especially sailor gang!? he was a waif, adrift the ocean on his own ship, a simple sailor. 
now he looks like he prowls the docks for youngsters when he has time off from his heavy lifting job. the little cap? the no hair? it's too much.


the thing that gets to me though, is this was my favorite skin in league. sailor gangplank with nothin' to prove. i am personally gutted, they should make reworked in game models look like their splash, not the other way around, especially with legacy skins. how is it a legacy if it is not what i bought anymore? 


i dunno. i am sad. but if it is just me that cares... ill shut up and get special forces gang.
